      • registerUser

        @RequestMapping(path="/registerSuccess",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView registerUser​(@Valid @ModelAttribute("user")
                                                                 @Valid User user,
                                                                 org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
        This method will carry out the user registration by sending the validated user to the business service
        Parameters:
        new - user with needed attributes
        binding - result
        Returns:
        loginPage, if the registration was successful; registrationPage with errors displayed, if unsuccessful

      • loginUser

        @RequestMapping(path="/loginSuccess",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView loginUser​(@ModelAttribute("user")
                                                              User user,
                                                              org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result,
                                                              javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        This method will carry out the user login by sending the validated user to the business service & creating a session with the user object
        Parameters:
        returning - user with attributes of username and password
        binding - result
        session - variable as it wil help the user stay logged in
        Returns:
        homePage, if the registration was successful; loginPage with errors displayed, if unsuccessful

      • logout

        @RequestMapping(path="/logout",
                method=GET)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView logout​(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        This method will carry out the user logout by destroying the session
        Parameters:
        session - variable as it will help the user to log out
        Returns:
        homePage
